message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal considering its true value.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $900,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer but I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $950,000.  This is a fair price considering the product's value. What do you say?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I still can't exceed $880,000. I hope this proposal works for you.
Bob, I understand your position, but $880,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $920,000 as a final compromise.  If you're serious about this deal, let's close it at this price.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $890,000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while staying within my budget.
